subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Having recently negotiated a release from his Joe Gibbs Racing contract at the end of this season, the two-time Cup series champion Tony Stewart announced Thursday that he would join the team currently known as Haas-CNC as an owner-driver in 2009.
snippet: Having recently negotiated a release from his Joe Gibbs Racing contract at the end of this season, the two-time Cup series champion Tony Stewart announced Thursday that he would join the team currently known as Haas-CNC as an owner-driver in 2009.
